details: The tool serves the purpose of adding specified work items into a designated sprint. Its functionality involves the addition of work items, identified by a list of work item IDs, to a sprint that is specified by its unique sprint ID. The 'work_ids' argument expects an array of strings representing the IDs of the work items intended for adding, while the 'sprint_id' argument requires a single string denoting the target sprint. This tool streamlines the process of managing and organizing work within a sprint by facilitating the addition of identified work items to the specified sprint.
tool_description: Adds the given work items to the sprint

arguments.arguments_description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint
The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added
